subject: Monaco Grand Prix
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Red Bull driver Sebastian Vettel won the Monaco Grand Prix on Sunday for his fifth victory in six races this season, beating Fernando Alonso of Ferrari and Jenson Button of McLaren in a thriller on Monaco’s famed street circuit.
snippet: The Red Bull driver Sebastian Vettel won the Monaco Grand Prix on Sunday for his fifth victory in six races this season, beating Fernando Alonso of Ferrari and Jenson Button of McLaren in a thriller on Monaco’s famed street circuit.
